name: EXO-Planet Elite
description:
EXO-Planet - the first 3rd-person shooter in ZERO G! Live Multiplayer DM and CTF action over 3G, WiFi and Bluetooth! Elite players earn DOUBLE the SCRIP every match and start the game with enough scrip to immediately unlock new weapons and armor

Free yourself from the bonds of gravity. Compete in multiplayer matches against other players on iPhone and iPod touch devices, and also against iPad players.

Set in a stunning galactic vista, on a spaceborne platform in a distant orbit, deadly games are played in zero gravity! Magnetic boots let you run on floors, walls, ceilings, or anything magnetic. Detach and leap into space to surprise opponents from above, below, or anywhere they least suspect! Launch your magnetic grapple to reel yourself back to the arena walls. Don’t drift too far or you’ll disappear into the void!

Leverage your arsenal of gear to dominate at Capture the Flag or Death Match online with opponents all around the world. Your exo-suit protects you from the cold vacuum of space and has flexible armor with regenerative energy shielding. Start with the LX-Automatic chain gun and acquire additional weapons including a rocket launcher and a laser sniper rifle! Outfitted with your powerful exo-suit, weapons and lightning-fast Mag-Line grapple, the action is swift and deadly.

Play matches to earn your way to stronger and more versatile weapons. Earn Scrip in every match based on your performance, and spend it to upgrade the different attributes of your exo-suit, grapple, and weapons -- like damage, speed, and range.Dominate the match by RENTING FULLY UPGRADED weapons and armor.

Compete in 1v1 matches locally over Bluetooth or 2v2 matches online over WiFi or 3G against opponents anywhere. Capture the most flags and score the most kills to earn the most scrip!




FEATURES

• The first 3rd-Person shooter played in zero-gravity!
• Play Capture the Flag, Death Match, or Gauntlet on unique, dedicated high-orbital platforms!
• Inhabit a powerful exo-suit with magnetic boots to navigate the void!
• Sling your way into enemy territory with a high-strength magnetic grapple!
• Win matches to earn scrip and upgrade your exo-suit, gear, and weapons!
• Play 1v1 over Bluetooth
• Play 2v2 Online over WiFi or 3G
• Compete against iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad players, all in the same arena!

BEST IN CLASS
• Experience a fully 3D, 3rd-Person Shooting experience
• Unique, innovative, and intuitive touch controls to navigate in space
• Run on floors, walls, ceilings, or fly in zero-gravity

Visit www.sgn.com
